org.gvsig.graph.solvers
Class MinimumSpanningTreeExtractor

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.graph.solvers.MinimumSpanningTreeExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDijkstraListener
public class MinimumSpanningTreeExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDijkstraListener

Author:
fjp This class can label nodes with distances and costs to a flag. You will obtain a temp shp layer with fields IdArc, IdEdge, CostOrig, DistOrig, CostEnd, DistEnd, IdFlag You will obtain a temp shp layer with the minimum spanning tree starting from Flag idFlag. MinimumSpanningTree (MST) can help to design networks (water networks, cable networks), because you can reach all node points with minimum length cost. (Offer service to the whole area, but expending less money on cable and holes).
